summary: [fic] The Light in Me - silly_cleo - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: [fic] The Light in Me - silly_cleo - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Category: F/F
Fandom: Critical Role
Rating: General Audiences
Words: 1,282
Relationships: Jester/Yasha
Summary: “Yashaaa! What are you doing up there?”

She considers whether not answering will make Jester give up and go away. She then considers whether that’s even what she actually wants right now.

-

I got to write Critical Role fic for @femslashex this year, and it was a great time! Many thanks to @walkthegale for epic beta-ing and cheerleading and handholding!

title: Critical Role Shout Out
body:
Shout out to Molly Cosplayers. Seriously, you guys are amazing.

Like, Taliesin literally was like “I’m going to make this characters outfit a nightmare for cosplayers.” and you guys are like “Challenge Accepted!”

Every Molly cosplay I have seen has looked so amazing. I mean you guys are a little nutty for taking on the challenge of an arch fey like this, so maybe watch your backs for a bit, but still, 10/10 cosplay skills.

summary: Interesting sequence of events in episode 39: - Fjord gives Caleb the gold ring to Identify - Caleb casts the spell, figures out...
body:
Interesting sequence of events in episode 39:

- Fjord gives Caleb the gold ring to Identify

- Caleb casts the spell, figures out it’s not magical but is worth a bit of money

- There’s a brief moment where it seems like Caleb is trying to give the ring back to Fjord, but he’s interrupted (around 1:29:00 on the YT video)

- High!Caleb earnestly returns the ring to Fjord, apologizing for “stealing” it from him

I feel like this tells us a lot about Caleb, and not just how honest being high made him. That he considered holding onto the ring after Identifying it “stealing,” even though he’d tried to return it, speaks to his tendency to cast all of his own actions in the worst possible light.

It also means that I kind of want high!Caleb to linger far into the beginning of the next episode, because who knows what other random bursts of insightful honesty we might get.

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

summary: @brianwfoster: 6 years ago, my life and its entire trajectory changed. Every day since then I’m more grateful, every day I try...
body: @brianwfoster: 6 years ago, my life and its entire trajectory changed. Every day since then I’m more grateful, every day I try to be better, more deserving of this gift. Life has thrown a lot at us these years, and we always come out stronger, closer, and loving a little something new about each other every trip around the sun. I don’t know how an old junkie like me got to be so lucky, but I am constantly in awe of your love, patience, laughter, and grace. You go your way baby, I’ll go your way too. Happy Anniversarary.

summary:
Beau: Caleb, we need to think. How do we usually get out of these messes?
Caleb: We don’t. We just make a bigger one that...
body:
Beau: Caleb, we need to think. How do we usually get out of these messes?
Caleb: We don’t. We just make a bigger one that cancels the first one out.

title: Slight hiatus
body:
Sorry to do this but I’m going to have to take a bit of a break from Tuskless Love for a week or so. Meaning there’ll be no new chapter this week and possibly none next week depending on how much more crap decides to land in my lap from all directions. 

Wish me luck, or a crap umbrella, or the biggest lacto-free ice cream you can find me.

summary: I did a cosplay test as beau and immediately became a jock? Dunno what to tell ya. I don't own hair bands yet so that's...
body:
I did a cosplay test as beau and immediately became a jock? Dunno what to tell ya. I don’t own hair bands yet so that’s something to get for Sunday. I am so excited to meet Marisha dressed as everyone’s favourite lesbian

He/him pronouns only please. Unless you are referring to the character in which case, obvs use she/her.
